subject.geographic: No157 Gravier street, New Orleans, La

mods.abstract: RUNAWAY SLAVE--ABSCONDED FROM the corner of Eighth and Nayades streets, yesterday morning, the 1st inst., about 6 o'clock, a negro woman named HANNAHDark mulatto, medium size, aged about 35 years, blind in one eye (though scarcely perceptible;) belongs to James Glass, of Warren county, MissA liberal reward will be paid for her apprehension and delivery to GREEN & CRUMP, No157 Gravier street, New Orleansd2 2t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
